plot: A crew of sponge-divers get tangled up with a gang of ruthless smugglers who plan to take advantage of their sponge fishing skills in order to bring to the surface priceless antiquities and then to smuggle them out of the country.
title: To limani ton dakryon
plot_es: A crew of sponge-divers get tangled up with a gang of ruthless smugglers who plan to take advantage of their sponge fishing skills in order to bring to the surface priceless antiquities and then to smuggle them out of the country.
plot_en: A crew of sponge-divers get tangled up with a gang of ruthless smugglers who plan to take advantage of their sponge fishing skills in order to bring to the surface priceless antiquities and then to smuggle them out of the country.
